description: Two speakers plan a side event (coffee) while the main group discusses work scheduling. Tests extraction of both main-thread and side-conversation events.

events.title: Architecture Deep Dive
events.reasoning: Alice and Dave agreed to a 2-hour architecture deep dive on Friday at 1 PM in the large conference room.

events.title: Coffee with Bob
events.reasoning: Bob and Carol had a side conversation about grabbing coffee. Initially set for 3 PM, Carol changed it to 3:30 PM at the lobby cafe.
events.assumptions: Duration assumed 30 minutes for a coffee

mock_llm_response.summary: Found 2 events: architecture deep dive (Friday 1 PM) and coffee (today 3:30 PM).

notes: Reference datetime is Wednesday 2026-02-18. 'Friday' resolves to 2026-02-20. The coffee time was updated mid-conversation from 3:00 to 3:30 (last instruction wins). Medium conversation (14 lines).
